attributes.action: My vote for a pro- EU/ second ref. in council elections was not a protest vote.
attributes.background:
We are hearing in the media today that a lot of the votes for pro EU parties were protest votes, or becuase we want the politicians to get on with brexit.
This is not the case, and if you voted for them like me because you wanted to remain please sign this petition.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241584
